answerText: lambda-CDM model [or lambda-cold dark matter model; or LCDM; or cold dark matter with dark energy model][10] The lambda-CDM accounts for this facet of modern cosmology, which was only discovered in 1998, during observations of high-redshift supernovae. Dark energy is responsible for it.
heading: PADAWAN |2014 | 15 | 12 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This model is by definition the concordance model of cosmology since it is the currently accepted and most commonly used model. [10] Name this "standard model" of Big Bang cosmology
